description: '''V/Vm''' was an alias of English musician '''Leyland James Kirby''', used for producing [[experimental music]]. Although starting out mainly in the style of [[noise music]], most releases under the V/Vm alias were [[plunderphonics]], with some original compositions. Most, but not all, of V/Vm's music was released under the [[V/Vm Test Records]] label. Alongside the work of the V/Vm project, Kirby also recorded as [[The Caretaker (musician)|The Caretaker]]. He currently resides in [[Krak√≥w]].
